meanings.definition: A Russian peasant or farm laborer.
meanings.sent1: The moujiks worked hard in the fields all day.
meanings.sent2: The village was filled with friendly moujiks.
meanings.sent3: The moujiks decided to have a dance party in the barn.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of the moujiks was as strong as the oak trees.
meanings.sent5: The colorful scarves worn by the moujiks brightened up the countryside.

meanings.sent1: Many moujiks gathered at the market to sell their produce.
meanings.sent2: The moujiks sang traditional songs during the harvest festival.
meanings.sent3: The moujiks' chickens laid golden eggs every morning.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the moujiks was a powerful force.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the moujiks echoed through the valley.
